posts.name: Bandai star version
posts.description: I love it because it still keeps my data from when I was little. The mini-games are still just as difficult.

posts.name: Tamagotchi bandai berry
posts.description: I carry it in my backpack to university and I always check the online events. I like customizing its accessories and backgrounds.

posts.name: Couple Tama paradise
posts.description: After several days of connecting them, they finally became friends and ended up as a couple. It’s incredibly cute to watch them.

posts.name: Tamagotchi Uni Paradise
posts.description: It doesn’t have colors or internet, but that’s exactly what makes it special. It reminds me of playing without distractions and just taking care of it patiently.

posts.name: Paradise Chicken
posts.description: I literally opened it today and I’m still learning how everything works. I’m excited to start taking care of it from baby stage and see what it becomes.
